TEXT: The applicant is a NORP national , born in DATE and living in GPE .
The facts of the case , as submitted by the parties , may be summarised as follows .

On DATE the public prosecutor of GPE summoned the applicant to appear before the CARDINAL - member first instance criminal court ( trimeles plimmeliodikio ) of GPE on DATE to be tried for making a false criminal accusation and perjury .

The applicant 's trial took place in his absence on DATE . He was found guilty and given a commutable sentence of DATE . The applicant appealed on DATE and the enforcement of the first instance decision was suspended .
On DATE the CARDINAL - member ORG ( trimeles efetio ) of GPE decided to discontinue the proceedings against the applicant because the action had become time - barred .
On DATE the applicant applied for compensation for the proceedings instituted against him .
On DATE ORG in GPE sent the applicant a letter it had received from ORG of GPE . This letter , dated DATE , was addressed to ORG and stated the following :
“ In reply to your letter of DATE , which concerns a request by PERSON , we inform you that , according to the law , he has no right to be compensated . ”
B. The applicant 's previous application under the Convention

On DATE the applicant lodged application No . CARDINAL with ORG complaining , inter alia , of the length of the above criminal proceedings against him , which were at the time pending at first instance .
On DATE the Commission declared the applicant 's complaint concerning the length of the first instance proceedings admissible . It declared the remainder of the application inadmissible .
On DATE the Commission expressed the opinion that the applicant 's right under LAW to a hearing within a reasonable time had been violated because of the length of the first instance proceedings .
On DATE ORG found that there had been a violation of LAW in the applicant 's case .
